name: gherkin-beautifier-vs-code-plugin
description: Gherkin Beautifier is a multilingual VS Code Plugin for indentation of Gherkin/Cucumber .feature files

conf.view.identsBefore.Feature.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Feature'

conf.view.identsBefore.Rule.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Rule'

conf.view.identsBefore.Scenario.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Scneario'

conf.view.identsBefore.Examples.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Examples'

conf.view.identsBefore.Background.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Background'

conf.view.identsBefore.ScenarioOutline.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Scenario Outline'

conf.view.identsBefore.Given.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Given'

conf.view.identsBefore.When.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'When'

conf.view.identsBefore.Then.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'Then'

conf.view.identsBefore.And.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'And'

conf.view.indentsBefore.Asterisk.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before '*'

conf.view.identsBefore.But.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before 'But'

conf.view.identsBefore.Tag.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before @ tags. Allowed values: amount of indentation chars or 'relative'

conf.view.identsBefore.Table.description: How many indentation symbols to insert before table '|'

conf.view.validate.tags.description: Validates if all tags are from allowed tags list and show warning messages upon saving feature files. How to specify tags? Example 1: @debug @important-component. Example 2: @debug, @important-component

conf.view.validate.tagsFile.description: Validates if all tags are from allowed tags list and show warning messages upon saving feature files. List of tags is specified by file. In a file tags should go one per line. Path to file is resolved relative to workspace folder

gherkin-beautifier.validate.complainIfTh.description: Validates if phrase in 'then' part of script contains the specified keyword (for example 'should', like Then Apple should be eaten). If word is missing, a warning will be shown, but script will be saved
